title: Aayiram Thamarai Mottukale Lyrics Alaigal Oivathillai
stanzas:
<div>
Aayiram Thamarai Mottukale Lyrics Alaigal Oivathillai

Aayiram thamarai mottukale
vandhu aanandha
kummigal  kottungalen (2)

ingu rendu jothi malligai
thottukollum kaaman pandgai
koyilil kadhal tholugai.

Aayiram thamarai mottukale
vandhu aanandha
kummigal  kottungalen

koththu malarae
amudham kottum malarae
ingu thaenai ottru
idhu theeyin ootru. (2)

ullirukkum verai vandhu
neer vaarkkum.
pullarikkum maeni
engum poo pookkum.
adikkadi thaagam vandhu
aalai kudikkum.

Aayiram thamarai mottukale
vandhu aanandha
kummigal  kottungalen(2)

veettukiliye koondai vittu
thaandi vandhiye
oru kadhal baaram
iru tholil yaerum.

pulveliyin meedhu
rendu poo maazhai.
ondrai ondru soodum
idhu pon meadai.
kalvadiyum pookkal
thangal kaambai marakkum.

Aayiram thamarai mottukale
vandhu aanandha
kummigal  kottungalen

ingu rendu jothi malligai
thottukollum kaaman pandgai
koyilil kadhal tholugai.

Aayiram thamarai mottukale
vandhu aanandha
kummigal  kottungalen
